lead_paragraph: TAMPA, Fla. - The other day, one of Bill Chuck's "Nine to Know" e-mail messages popped into my mailbox, and Fact No. 3 seemed too crazy, too outrageous, to be true. But it was.
snippet: Marcus Thames, who signed a minor league deal with the Yankees last month, has hit 100 career home runs in the fewest at-bats in major league history....
abstract: Marcus Thames, who signed a minor league deal with the Yankees last month, has hit 100 career home runs in the fewest at-bats in major league history.
